Battera::

In her FlyingFox bat form, she loved flying in the warm air currents. 
This was her element. And she lovd every nanosecond of it. While 
gliding, she saw another bot signature appear on her scanner. She 
looked around but didn't see where the bot was. She flew higher to 
gain a better view. She still didn't see the bot but her scanner was 
still showing it. She sighed and wondered if her scanner was acting 
up. She did a barrel roll to change her course a bit. As she did, she 
saw another bot flying above her. Her scanner was not showing a pred 
or maximal signature. Her scanner was just a tad out of date. She 
made the mental note that when she got back to base, to have that 
fixed.  She flew up towards the bot, hoping for a friendly encounter. 
Not a mechfluid bath. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He continues to fly at a much higher altitude.  When they 
stop he 
> circles overhead and finally takes the time to inspect the other 
two bots 
> with Blackstorm.  He focuses first on Maxima remembering how 
disturbed she 
> had been when he exited the CR tank at the Predacon base.  He then 
focused 
> his attention on Battera.  He had only heard her voice in the 
Predacon base 
> and hadn't taken the time to look at her.  He knew he recognized 
her from 
> somewhere but he couldn't quite place her.
